## useSequencer() function

A composable that creates or uses a charset to increment and decrement face values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useSequencer(options?: SequencerOptions): SequencerContext;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [SequencerOptions](./flipclock.sequenceroptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |
